title: Components
text:
Components




Warning


Hey there! Seems like you are still using the documentation of our legacy Java repository. Since it wonâ€™t be maintained anymore, we recommend you to checkout the new Java page here.





Following separation-of-concerns we divide an application into components using our package-conventions and project structure.
As described by the architecture each component is divided into layers as described in the project structure.
Please note that a component will only have the required layers.
So a component may have any number from one to all layers.
